verbose_text: Ceramide is generated by (i) sphingomyelinases [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], (ii) by a de novo synthase pathway [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], (iii) by a retrograde activity of the enzyme ceramidase that mediates the synthesis of ceramide from sphingosine [XREF_BIBR], (iv) by the hydrolysis of complex glycosylated lipids [XREF_BIBR] and (v) by hydrolysis of ceramide 1-phosphate [XREF_BIBR].
